actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Veterans' Administration Physician and Dentist Pay Comparability Act of 1975, as amended, in order to extend the authority to enter into special pay agreements with physicians and dentists employed by the Department of Medicine and Surgery, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Veterans' Administration Physician and Dentist Pay Comparability Act of 1975 to extend to fiscal year 1979 the authority of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to enter into special pay agreements with physicians and dentists employed by the Veterans' Administration Department of Medicine and Surgery.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Veterans' Administration Physician and Dentist Pay Comparability Act of 1975, as amended, in order to extend the authority to enter into special pay agreements with physicians and dentists employed by the Department of Medicine and Surgery, and for other purposes.
